name: Bronto Hide Armor

Large Patch of Hard Bronto Hide - Tanned

raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ A piece of Bronto Hide (ie: #L "Large Patch of Hard Bronto Hide" "162224") #L "B.B.I. - Nano Enhanced B-12 Tanning Acid" "162247" #L "Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Shape Soft Armor)" "162222" #L "Mass Relocating Robot" "155592" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Shape Soft Armor) + Mass Relocating Robot = #L "Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Soft Armor)" "162220" Skills: | 2.5EE,2.5ME,2.5NP | ------------------------------ B.B.I. - Nano Enhanced B-12 Tanning Acid + A piece of Bronto Hide = A piece of Tanned Bronto Hide (ie: #L "Large Patch of Hard Bronto Hide - Tanned" "162236") Skills: | CH,AG | ------------------------------ Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Soft Armor) + A piece of Tanned Bronto Hide = A Bronto Hide Armor part (ie: #L "Bronto Hide Tunic" "162206") Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ #L "Large Patch of Hard Bronto Hide" "162224" -> #L "Bronto Hide Tunic" "162206" #L "Large Patch of Soft Bronto Hide" "162226" -> #L "Bronto Hide Legwear" "162216" #L "Patch of Hard Bronto Hide" "162228" -> #L "Bronto Hide Boots" "162208" #L "Patch of Soft Bronto Hide" "162230" -> #L "Bronto Hide Sleeves" "162204" #L "Small Patch of Hard Bronto Hide" "162232" -> #L "Bronto Hide Gloves" "162210" #L "Small Patch of Soft Bronto Hide" "162234" -> #L "Bronto Hide Hood" "162212" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Very good overall AC stats along with Max Nano modifier. The #L "Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Shape Soft Armor)" "162222" is very very rare, Team boss loot Ql60 :(
